name: strength snowflake
notes:
the strength snowflake is part of the snowfall 2025: contemplations. this snowflake is available for [free on my blog][1] or in the pdf ebook of all 12 snowflake patterns here.

read more about this pattern and view it free on [my blog here][2].

this pattern includes written instructions only and photo tutorial on stiffening snowflakes. there are no charts.

for pattern support i recommend joining my facebook group: [jessica wifallâ€™s crochet studio][3]
